masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote:
"Someone is systematically destroying every public Christmas tree in the city! They've hit six already—chainsaws, fire, some kind of acid? They left a note: 'Trees belong in forests, not in your living rooms.' The Civic Center tree is the last one standing and they're heading there NOW!"

Requirements

  • Intercept the Tree Terminator at Civic Center
  • Protect the last public Christmas tree
  • Understand their environmental extremism—is there a valid point buried in the crazy?
